lantern_ability.hold: Fires a lightning bolt in a direction that deals 200 Shock damage multiple times as it passes through a Behemoth.
Create a fire ball in front of you that explodes after 5 seconds, dealing 750 Blaze damage to all nearby Behemoths.
Create a frost pillar in front of you that deals 940 Frost damage to all nearby Behemoths over 12 seconds.
Disperses aether that allows the Slayer to track the Behemoth.
Creates an aura that grants nearby slayers 15% increased movespeed and attack speed for 15 seconds.

lantern_ability.instant: Grants a 200 hit point shield for 4 seconds.
lantern_ability.hold: Surrounds the slayer in swirling stone that deals 720 damage to all nearby Behemoths over 12 seconds.

Acidic.name: Acidic
Acidic.description: Increases Wound damage at the cost of Part damage.

description: Converts 30% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
Converts 40% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage

The Hunger.name: The Hunger
The Hunger.description: The Hunger is a craftable Exotic weapon in Dauntless. It is crafted from Shrowd reagents.

unique_effects.name: HungerDamageIncreaseMeter
unique_effects.description: Deal up to 25% increased damage as your meter increases.

unique_effects.name: HungerDamageIncreaseFeast
unique_effects.description: Activate at max meter to enter Feast, dealing 75% increased damage for 15 seconds, but taking damage after each hit.

unique_effects.name: HungerRegainHealth
unique_effects.description: Activate again during Feast to unleash an Umbral attack that can regain lost health.
